    • About Dean Adler


    Dean Adler has been a South Florida resident since 1973, originally residing in Miami-Dade County, then moving to Broward County over 30 years ago. In the 1980âs Dean became the youngest Police Officer for the City of Miami Beach at age 19, ultimately retiring early due to an on-the-job injury. Dean is currently a Mortgage Loan Originator with Paramount Residential Mortgage Group, Inc. (PRMG) in Sunrise, Florida specializing in residential purchases and refinances. He focuses on his Law Enforcement roots through relationships with Police Officers, Firefighters, Veterans and their family members. With over 25 years of experience, closing well over 2,000 mortgages, Dean and his support staff have the knowledge to guide you through the entire loan process. So whether youâre purchasing or refinancing your home or if you need the assistance of one of Deanâs top real estate agent partners, call him today. Deal With Someone You Can Trust!
